name: Where da bone at
description: Our dog came onto the train with his prized bone. But after going to get it from it's hiding space, it dissapeared. Find who took the bone.

clue_1.name: Food shortage
clue_1.description: Circuit-7 checked the logs of the trains food stores and found that they are much lower than analysis expected.
clue_1.hint: Circuit-7 has been analyzing the shops cargo records.
clue_1.conversation_lead: Circuit-7 has been noticing some discrepencies in the ships cargo log, specifically the food stores. He might share that if you as him about cargo issues.

clue_2.name: Loud slurping
clue_2.description: Ashleigh was trying to take a nap, and was awoken by the sound of loud slurping at the back of the train, near the buffet.
clue_2.hint: Ashleigh judges everyone on the ship very harshly.
clue_2.conversation_lead: Ashleigh needs to get her beauty sleep, but can't because of annoying noises during the train ride. Steer towards asking her about herself and her feelings.

clue_3.name: Bone broth
clue_3.description: JPhilli was missing his homemade bone broth stew. So, taking ramen from the train and a bone he found, he combined them for a stew.
clue_3.hint: JPhilli loves to eat food, especially stew.
clue_3.conversation_lead: JPhilli misses home, especially his moms cooking. Steer towards asking him about family and food.
